lines.text: DUMMY
a = array of 4 integers
Read n values into array a
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < 4 ; i ++ ) cin >> a [ i ] ;

lines.text: best = integer , set to 0
for o = 0 to 4 exclusive
v = array of integers
for i = 0 to 4 exclusive
if i is not equal to o , then add elements from array a at end of vector v
lines.code: if ( i != o ) v . push_back ( a [ i ] ) ;

lines.text: sort vector elements in ascending order
if v [ 0 ] + v [ 1 ] is greater than v [ 2 ]
set best to maximum value of best and 2
else if v [ 0 ] + v [ 1 ] is equal to v [ 2 ]
set best to maximum value of best and 1
DUMMY
if best is equal to 2
print TRIANGLE and a new line
else if best is equal to 1
print SEGMENT and a new line
else do the following
print IMPOSSIBLE and a new line
DUMMY
DUMMY
